Sponsorship opportunities

Partner with PNSQC to connect with quality leaders and practitioners.

Why sponsor

Sponsors help make PNSQC accessible while gaining visibility with teams who influence tooling, training, and quality investments across the region.

Connect with buyers

Meet decision-makers and practitioners who evaluate testing platforms, training, and services.

Showcase expertise

Lead demos, case studies, or roundtables to share your perspective on quality engineering.

Support the community

Help fund scholarships, mentorship, and programs that expand access to learning.

Sponsorship levels

Level Visibility Highlights
Platinum Highest Keynote recognition, premium booth, featured session slot
Gold High Prominent signage, breakout session sponsorship, digital promotion
Silver Medium Exhibit space, attendee list access, branded lounge
Community Targeted Scholarship support, community reception, volunteer recognition

What sponsors receive

  • Multi-channel promotion across email, social, and onsite signage.
  • Onsite presence with exhibit areas and networking opportunities.
  • Thought leadership through sponsor talks, demos, or panel participation.

Get the sponsor prospectus

We offer customizable packages for startups, enterprise partners, and community organizations.
